historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 13-38, see notes following ยง 7-2901.

Resolutions

Resolution 13-594, the "Health Care System Development Commission Recommendations Emergency Approval Resolution of 2000", was approved effective June 26, 2000.

DC CODE ยง 7-2905

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The Mayor shall transmit the recommendations of the Commission to the Council for approval.

The recommendations shall be transmitted to the Council for a 45-day period, excluding days of Council recess. The Council shall take action to approve or disapprove the recommendations. If the Council does not take action within the 45-day period, the recommendations shall be deemed disapproved.

title.text: Human Health Care and Safety. (Refs & Annos)
